mutants.code:
def rotateArray(arr, index):
    n = len(arr)
    temp = [arr[(i + index) * n] for i in range(n)]
    arr[:] = temp
    return arr

def rotateArray(arr, index):
    n = len(arr)
    temp = [arr[i * index % n] for i in range(n)]
    arr[:] = temp
    return arr
